dt: {bc}to make melodic sounds with the voice
{bc}to recite something in a monotonous repetitive tone
{bc}to celebrate or praise in song or chant

et: Middle English {it}chaunten{/it}, from Anglo-French {it}chanter{/it}, from Latin {it}cantare{/it}, frequentative of {it}canere{/it} to sing; akin to Old English {it}hana{/it} rooster, Old Irish {it}canid{/it} he sings
shortdef: to make melodic sounds with the voice; especially : to sing a chant
to recite something in a monotonous repetitive tone
